text: The Planning Institute of Paris is a scientific research institute and university graduate training in the field of urban planning. It is in the Paris 12 Val de Marne University campus, France. The institute was established in 1919. It is a member of AESOP (Association of European Schools of Planning) and the French Urbanism Institute. == Other websites == * Planning Institute of Paris Category:Urban planning organizations Category:1919 establishments in France Category:Organizations based in Paris Category:Research organizations in Europe
title: Planning Institute of Paris
